review: This hotel is bang in the middle of the busy market place and has all attractions nearby. The hotel itself is good to stay with a restaurant on the ground floor which is just about average. The staff and management are very courteous,
name: Sureka S

review: This is in the bang of the city and there is absolutely no dull moment because of that. The restaurant on the ground floor is neat and nice and the variety it offers in veg and non veg is decent. There is bikanerwala bang opposite this hotel and the food there is great in case you dont want to eat at kaushalya.
name: Sureka S

review: This is my first review and I visited this hotel first time i thought that is would be normal but it is marvellous and the service is good as a five star hotel the food is also good and the sanitary was also good there is nothing to complain about this hotel all i can do is compliment it
name: Dipanshu R

review: Very centrally located this hotel has shown some improvement since my last visit. They have started a Restaurant which offers a large variety of foods vegetarian as well as non vegetarian.The Rooms are also neat, clean and well laid out. teh pricing is economical. And very centrally located. A must stay.
name: Alok S

review: Located bang in the middle of the market this hotel has average rooms and average food. The biggest advantage is its vantage location. You can step out of the hotel and have access to umpteen restaurants, the market ( in case you need anything). Unless you are looking for luxury this is a perfect restaurant.
name: Alok S
